topic.title: HP Helion OpenStack 1.1: Viewing Image Details

body.p: To view image details: 1. Launch the HP Helion OpenStack Helion Dashboard.

li.p: Click the Images link on the Project dashboard Compute panel.
Click the name of the image.

body.p: **Note:** When your cursor is on the image name, the name is underlined.

li.p: The Image Details screen shows detailed information about the image, including:
